intro: When the imagination comes to life, only the heart can trace the way back
description:
Lila Colorful is a little girl with a passion for painting who discovers a magic paintbrush capable of bringing to life everything she draws. 

What begins as a dream comes true turns into colorful chaos when her creations escape and transform her town into a world full of living art. 

With the help of Azul, a little watercolor dragon, Lila must learn to control her magic and use it responsibly to restore balance. 


A story about imagination, creative power and the value of knowing oneself.
